original_text: Thus shalt thou say to the prophet, What hath the Lord answered thee? and, What hath the Lord spoken?
korean_text: 너는 또 선지자에게 말하기를 여호와께서 네게 무엇이라 대답하셨으며 여호와께서 무엇이라 말씀하셨느냐

sentences.original_text: Thus shalt thou say to the prophet
What hath the Lord answered thee?
and, What hath the Lord spoken?
